name: Saul Alinsky
education: University of Chicago, Ph.B. 1930, U. of Chicago Graduate School, criminology, 1930–1932
influenced: Ed Chambers, Cesar Chavez, Ernesto Cortes, Patrick Crowley Tom Gaudette,  Michael Gecan, Wade Rathke, Lila Rose, James O'Keefe
spouse: Helene Simon of Philadelphia, m. 9 June 1932 – her death, Jean Graham, 15 May 1959 – div 1970, Irene Alinsky, May 1971
